title: Authorization for Session Entry - Digitell Live Events Platform

identifier.description: Unique identifier representing a single person. Comprised of the client reference followed by a client provided ID

name.description: User's registered email. Visible on reporting but not available to other attendees

email.description: User's registered email. Visible on reporting but not available to other attendees

oneOf.description: Unique identifier representing a single person. Comprised of the client reference followed by a client provided ID

session.description: Unique ID forming part of the URL as well as being used for remote authentication

iat.description: Issued at time. Should be the time() on the server where the auth code was created

exp.description: Expiry time. Should be the time() on the server when the auth code was issued, plus a small margin, such as 5 minutes (300)

jti.description: A cryptographic nonce. Must be a random string comprised of letters a-Z and numbers 0-9

aud.description: Audience. MUST be an array containing target audience (see docs)
